name: Deathwish Donny
description:
Donny Dare, the world’s premier circus performer, has avoided death a thousand times. He is a master fire-eater, the king of lion taming, and the only man to motorcycle through a ring of fire while juggling chainsaws. The carnival’s new Human Cannonball will be Donny’s biggest stunt yet, but Donny’s fame has made him enemies. You play as Ken, a disgruntled cannon operator, who has sworn to kill the man who cannot be killed.

Fire an indestructible man out of a cannon and try your hardest to kill him in this bloody rogue-like platformer.
